strings.Value: "It's unsafe to set up camp in the open like this."
"Being this careless could cost us dearly."
"Stop your whining, cleric. If someone jumps us, I'll save your hide!"
"Each careless step taken is one step closer to Groetus. Surely you understand that everyone shall rest in his embrace in the end, no matter how carefully they try to delay the final moment?"
"You are right. The art of camouflage has been developed over many centuries. It's unwise to neglect it!"
"You complain as though you'll be the one slicing up the monsters if they attack us, ha, ha, ha."
